Plot: A drama centered on three people -- a blue-collar American, a French journalist and a London school boy -- who are touched by death in different ways.
Title: Hereafter
Actors: Cécile De France, Thierry Neuvic, Cyndi Mayo Davis, Lisa Griffiths
tomatoConsensus: Despite a thought-provoking premise and Clint Eastwood's typical flair as director, Hereafter fails to generate much compelling drama, straddling the line between poignant sentimentality and hokey tedium.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 13 nominations.
